moreBlocks.articles:
• How We Work
    At the start of a relationship with L&V, you can expect an informed and interested response to your call or e-mail. We will provide information, answers and guidance during your first contact with our firm.
  • Experience + Professionalism = Results
    There is no substitute for experience. Your circumstance of loss and suffering is not the time to be someone else’s proving ground.

description:
At Leeseberg Tuttle, we bring over 70 years of collective legal experience to our clients. Our two founding partners, Gerry Leeseberg and Anne Valentine, are each certified in trial advocacy by the National Board of Trial Advocacy.

Our experienced and renowned medical malpractice and personal injury attorneys take on the largest insurance companies and medical care providers regularly on behalf of injured clients in Ohio and other states. Based in Columbus, our team has recovered some of the largest verdicts and settlements in Ohio on behalf of victims and victims' families.

Our law firm represents people who have suffered serious injuries, families that have lost loved ones and people who have become disabled due to negligence or other misconduct, including:

  • Medical malpractice
  • Medical device defects
  • Negligent motor vehicle drivers
  • Nursing home abuse and neglect
  • Other product defects and dangerous products

We have decades of experience advocating for justice and full and fair compensation on behalf of our clients. Each of our dedicated lawyers is passionate about our practice and compassionate in every interaction with our clients. We are sincere about the extensive resources we offer each of our clients.

At Leeseberg Tuttle, we have full-time nurses on staff to assist with the investigation and development of your case. We can access a global database of medical literature and a global network of specialists in every existing medical specialty to establish the full and fair value of your case and defend it against all challenges.
